thread.title: After claims of her Nigerian boyfriend assaulting her, Kenyan woman reveals she lied ▷ NAIJ.COM
thread.title_full: After claims of her Nigerian boyfriend assaulting her, Kenyan woman reveals she lied ▷ NAIJ.COM

author: Chinma Ihenacho
title: After claims of her Nigerian boyfriend assaulting her, Kenyan woman reveals she lied ▷ NAIJ.COM
text: A Kenyan socialite, identified as Francene Chettle, who laid allegations of assault and battery against her Nigerian boyfriend, has revealed the truth. Francene Chettle and her Nigerian baby daddy Bola Gold Sometime in October 2016, Francene who is also a model, had reached out to her over 15,000 followers on Instagram with claims that her then boyfriend, Nigerian-born Bola Gold, was abusing her. Francene claimed that Bola who is the father of her child and the owner of Gold Empire, an events promotion company, was a serial abuser. She wrote: “ Hey everyone. My account was hacked by Bola Gold. He took my phones and is using my WhatsApp to talk to people. I don’t have a phone right now. He beat me last night at B-Club and has been harassing my family and I. If you have me on WhatsApp, block the number. This man is a psycho. ” PAY ATTENTION: Get all the latest gossips on NAIJ Gossip App Bola was arrested and even locked up by the police and upon release from detention, left Kenya for good. Speaking about his arrest then, Bola said: “ It is not true. We went to B-Club together, I wanted to talk to her. I asked if I could have a word with her privately, but when we went outside and she spotted a cop, she told him I defiled her, and was arrested. I told him it wasn’t true, he let me go. I went home, packed my things because I couldn’t believe someone I had been living with for three years could do that to me. She should release proof that shows I assaulted her. ” Bola Gold and Francene Chettle with their baby Months later, Francene has come out to clear the air, revealing the fact that she lied about the situation, admitting that she was the one being violent in the relationship. She said she was the one who would slap Bola, who would have no choice but to return the slap. She said they still talk however, especially since she's her baby's father. Speaking in a video interview, she said: Na wa oo!
